description.en: Let's build a JengaTM tower with your robot!

Build a tower by stacking the Jenga blocks on the top of each other.
Place three parallel blocks level by level.
The game ends when the tower falls.

1-5 levels = Good job! Are you ready for another round?
6-10 levels = Wow! Excellent job! Do you want to try again?
11-15 levels = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points!
1-5 levels = 5 points
6-10 levels = 10 points
11-15 levels = 15 points
We would love to see your results, please share it through our forum page by clicking on the following link:
